name: Wispy: Guardian of the Lost and Found
name_original: Wispy: Guardian of the Lost and Found
description:
Wispy the Guardian, travels through the dimensions of the Lost and Found. Travel between both dimensions as you search for something or someone, beware of lingering too long in the dimension of the Lost or become lost yourself...

Made in 48 hours as part of the 2021 Global Game Jam, Australia.
